items.sentence: You often need to spend more time doing something than you anticipated.
I just heard that Tom and Mary are coming back to Boston for Christmas.
I studied French when I was seven, but now I only remember a few words.
There are three health food stores within walking distance of my house.
Tickets are $30 for general admission and $20 for students and seniors.
Tom donated money to the Red Cross to help survivors of the earthquake.
I think it\'ll cost you more than 10,000 yen to have this camera fixed.
If I speak French, most of the people in the room won\'t understand me.
The police couldn\'t find any footprints outside Tom\'s bedroom window.
I noticed that Tom was doing something he wasn\'t supposed to be doing.
I don\'t think it\'s likely that Tom will come over this time of night.
Tom has been meaning to clean out his badly cluttered garage for years.
When Mary and I were married, we used to go bowling with Tom and Alice.
Tom took out his driver\'s license and handed it to the police officer.
Do you think anyone will be able to overhear what we\'re talking about?
Tom is pretty good at juggling, but Mary doesn\'t seem to be impressed.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to be able to convince Mary to help him.
Tom knows he\'ll never be able to play the French horn as well as Mary.
Tom asked Mary some very personal questions that she refused to answer.
Tom began to sing "Happy Birthday" and the entire restaurant joined in.
Tom discussed every item on the menu with the waiter before he ordered.
Why don\'t you think about it for a while before you make up your mind?
Tom decided to delete his email address from every page on his website.
Do you really think your parents will let you go to Boston by yourself?
We would\'ve gone home early, but Tom asked us to stay a little longer.
Tom and Mary met in the hospital cafeteria the day Mary\'s father died.
Tom has been having the same dream every night for the past six months.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice were sitting around the table, playing cards.
I can\'t see how anybody could\'ve accomplished this without some help.
The only restaurant that Tom really likes is the one across the street.
The police caught the suicide bomber before he could detonate his bomb.
The police have been searching for the stolen goods for almost a month.
I wouldn\'t want Tom to think we\'re not taking his proposal seriously.
I was surprised when Tom said he was applying for a job at our company.
Tom shouted Mary\'s name as loud as he could, but she didn\'t hear him.
Tom heard gunshots and looked out the window to see what was happening.
Tom is the captain of the soccer team and is also on the baseball team.
Tom knew that many of the cars in the parking lot belonged to students.
Tom knew that Mary was likely to not be ready when he got to her house.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary why he didn\'t want her to go to Boston with him.
Tom saw Mary\'s car in John\'s driveway and wondered why she was there.
Please excuse my bad French. I\'m just beginning to learn the language.
Tom had one big ambition in life. That was to become a race car driver.
Tom has already finished reading the book that Mary gave him yesterday.
Tom has bad eyes, so he always sits in the very front of the classroom.
Tom has been avoiding me like the plague ever since he borrowed my car.
Tom didn\'t think Mary would enjoy his party, so he didn\'t invite her.
I finally broke down and bought the game my son had been asking me for.
Tom wouldn\'t have given this to me if it weren\'t something important.
People in the village still talked about the horrible way Tom had died.
